notes: Very modern and clean apartment with high-quality finishes including white tile flooring, modern kitchen with washer/dryer, built-in wardrobes, and recessed lighting. The space is bright, minimalist, and well-maintained with no visible sharp corners or hazards for a baby. At floor 10 of 13, an elevator is highly likely; the unit appears safe for children with no visible balcony access in photos and smooth modern surfaces throughout.
